Based on your preferences, I would recommend the following movies:

  * "A Bridge Too Far" (2000) directed by Steven Spielberg. A war drama that tells the story of Operation Market Garden during World War II. The movie features an ensemble cast including Patrick Wayne, Jordi Mollà, Marc Blucas, Dennis Quaid.

  * "Flags of Our Fathers" (2004) directed by Francis Ford Coppola. A war drama that tells the story of the Battle of Iwo Jima during World War II. The movie features an ensemble cast including Patrick Wayne, Jordi Mollà, Marc Blucas, Dennis Quaid.

  * "The Alamo" (2007) directed by Steven Spielberg. A war drama that tells the story of the Battle of the Alamo in San Antonio Texas during World War II. The movie features an ensemble cast including Patrick Wayne, Jordi Mollà, Marc Blucas, Dennis Quaid.

  * "In the Woods" (2007) directed by Francis Ford Coppola. A war drama that tells the story of the Battle of Iwo Jima in San Antonio Texas during World War II. The movie features an ensemble cast including Patrick Wayne, Jordi Mollà, Marc Blucas, Dennis Quaid.

Overall, these movies offer engaging stories and performances from an impressive ensemble cast.

Based on your preferences, here are two recommendations:
1. "The Jungle Book 2" (2003) - This is a sequel to the classic animated movie "The Jungle Book" (1967). In this installment, Mowgli discovers that he has been adopted by a human family and must learn how to live in a modern world while still maintaining his love for nature and animals.
2. "Happy Feet" (2006) - This is a musical animated film based on the children's book of the same name by E. Bruce Woodard. In this film, Mowgli meets a group of penguins who are on a quest to save their home, the South Pole, from a catastrophic ice age that threatens to wipe out all life on Earth.
Both "The Jungle Book 2" and "Happy Feet" feature beloved characters, engaging plotlines, and musical performances that will delight audiences of all ages.
